thread.title: Alabama beat reporters: What was up with Bret Beilema and Cam Robinson? - AL.com
thread.title_full: Alabama beat reporters: What was up with Bret Beilema and Cam Robinson? - AL.com

title: Alabama beat reporters: What was up with Bret Beilema and Cam Robinson? - AL.com
text:
Comments 
Watch the video above to see what Alabama beat reporters John Talty and Matt Zenitz make of the Arkansas head coach Bret Beilema vs Alabama offensive lineman Cam Robinson incident reported with an accompanying video on Twitter. 
For the full story on the incident see Alabama beat reporter Michael Casagrande's report on Beilema's odd activities . 
The video clip posted to twitter shows Arkansas coach Bret Beilema approaching Alabama's Cam Robinson as the Tide offensive lineman pushes back from apparent jawing from Arkansas defensive lineman Hjalte Froholdt, following a Jake Coker interception. @ClayTravisBGID watch Beilema instegate Cam Robinson, fake like he was shoved, then dance a jig to celebrate. pic.twitter.com/DYSSZdEkOM â€” Anthony Jacks (@Coach_Jacks) October 12, 2015 
Bielema walked up to Robinson then seems to fall backwards as if shoved by Robinson. The linesman throws his flag only after Bielema stumbled but the video shows no contact between the two. Bielema's celebration has added to the controversy. 
To date the original source of the video is unknown. 
Check out photos from the game below.
